msbt.message: Heeey, welcome to my room! I mean, sure, it's JUST a dream, but that doesn't make it any less fab.
Oh! Yay! I was hoping someone would visit, !I got so bored waiting, I almost drifted off to sleep! But, like, falling asleep in a dream is just TOO weird.

Awesome! A visitor! It's funny, because I had this dream where someone was going to visit me Or waitam I just, like, thinking of the dream I'm having now where you visit me?Ugh! What is it with dreams being sooo confusing, ?
I'm just, like, REALLY feeling the layout of this room right now.How did I do it, you ask? Oh, it's just a little something I dreamed up, .

Sooo, what do you think of my dream home? Look around. Check it out. Totes fab, amiright?What?! What do you mean there's dust in the corner, ?!That's just, uh, the manifestation of your desire to see that even a pop star like me has imperfections!
I wouldn't blame folks if they called my home a "dream home."I mean, sure, it's in a dream. Fine. But also, just look at it. It's totes fab anyway, !
